General.Name: Diligent Media Corporation Limited
General.Description: Diligent Media Corporation Limited engages in the distribution of news through digital media in India. It also operates a news website, www.dnaindia.com; and an e-paper edition through epaper.dnaindia.com. The company offers content through DNA Syndication. Diligent Media Corporation Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Mumbai, India.
